name: Planethesis
description:
A  war has been raging between Church and Science and only one party can come through as victorious! Decide whether the world will follow the holy Path or trust in the works of Galileo Galilei. 

Choose your stand and don’t let the other side take over the Universe!

Controls:
  • Control the Universe with the left and right Arrow-Keys or a/d
  • Destroy the other parties missionaries with the surrounding planets

Created together with:

https://lenzkleiser.itch.io/

https://manolowi.itch.io/

Made for the n00bs Game-Jam in 3 days
